replies.body: Hey look {{champion:154}} has two of the same chroma skins........really riot?
lets be honest, we're all just going to use the pink one anyways. ;)
Princess Bubblegum Zac... great.

To be perfectly honest (despite me not being one of those people), but for those who have been constantly saying "Zac needs moar skins!!" you should be happy that he is now getting both the Pool Party skin and also three chroma skins. I think it's great they're giving him more attention than what was initially asked by the community. {{champion:154}}
Yellow and Orange although similar, are actually different colours...
No, can't you see? If you turn to the left a little, one of them is a shade darker... honestly they could have made one of them white or purple. At least they would look different
black looks amazing on zac!

:OOOO

It's all coming to me now!
Dear Riot,  I love you, the more you nerf ekko the more I will love you. xx True love forever, Suffocator.

One question:
Why buff Jax's ult?

he is one of the champs that even mediocre players, once they used him a bit can nearly 1v5

yay I've been waiting for the Morgana chroma skins! {{champion:25}}

Make a skin for all the champions called "Classic [champion's name]'or something like that. In that skin it should be the skin that was not change by the visual update. Like 'Classic Anivia' so older players can play that one if they don't like the new one (like me :) ).
THIS

Yay new mastery's finally that useless 50 hp shield is gone
It was my favorite mastery. I used it to make the opponent think i was bad right b4 i killed them with 49 hp remaining. (if i didnt have the shield i would have died)
Hopefully patching the game will fix my problem of logging in. I want dat Sweet Zac
Finally, they nerfed ekko >.>
I don't own him (yet) and until now I didn't realize his ult was FREE. Glad that's fixed...
